column5: anyone know of an Evinrude dealer in the Gta ? need a fuel pump for a 1995 15 hp Evinrude I just bought. local dealer in pickering is of no help. did a  search dealer thing, but only two in the area says. Thanks
Anybody who sells marine parts can help , doesn't need to be an Evinrude dealer .
There probably are only two or three Evinrude dealers in the GTA. The dealer locator on their website would be the best source of info.

My small remote lake boat has a old Evinrude and when I need parts I phone Nestor Falls Marine and order over the phone. The parts arrive in a few days through Canada Post. Never had a problem. May take a day or two longer to reach southern Ont. but the service they provide is top notch. [post=http://www.google.ca/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&ved=0CC4QFjAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nestorfallsmarine.com%2F&ei=XKsSUouODdSgqQGD14HwDA&usg=AFQjCNFPSM7BiJKmXReHIlC3_Hs7bsESxw&sig2=KZgb8f746Nt0MhXsCIyvgg&bvm=bv.50768961,d.aWM][/post]

There are a couple in the Hamilton area: Bay City Marine and Dundas Marine.  Be glad to pick up the required parts for you. I work near 401/Keele in Toronto, so you could meet me there to reduce your trip. Send PM if I can help.
Thanks for the replies gentlemen.. am looking at some options.
I have ordered parts for my 1997 johnson 15hp at Brentwood Marine in Barrie -  342 Tollendal Mill Rd Barrie, ON L4N 7S6(705) 722-8344
I've dealt with these guys recently for some parts and was happy with the service.  They are in Markham.  http://www.centraloutboard.ca/
Call Kim at Central Outboard Marine. Tons of experience and great to deal with. Good luck.    Forgot to mention he's located on Woodbine ave just north on Hwy #7.
